sql-script.tran-sql: create table sf_workflow_model ( id char(32) not null, modelname varchar(64) not null, modelver varchar(16) not null, modeltext varchar(128), status int2 not null, userid char(32) not null, usertext varchar(32) not null, createdate timestamp not null, processcount int4 not null, primary key(id), unique(modelname) );
create table sf_workflow_model_domain ( id char(32) not null, modelid char(32) not null, domainid char(32) not null, processcount int4 not null, primary key(id), unique(modelid, domainid) );

create table sf_workflow_process ( id char(32) not null, modelid char(32) not null, modelname varchar(64) not null, version varchar(16) not null, title varchar(128), pno varchar(64), status int2 not null, userid char(32), deptid char(32), domainid char(32), usertext varchar(32), createdate timestamp not null, roleid char(32), completedate timestamp, comments int4 not null, views int4 not null, properties text, primary key(id) );

create table sf_workflow_delegation ( id char(32) not null, delegationsource int2 not null, sourceid char(32) not null, status int2 not null, createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, usertext varchar(32) not null, startdate timestamp, completedate timestamp, dstartdate timestamp, dcompletedate timestamp, rulehandler varchar(128), description varchar(256), primary key(id) );

create table sf_workflow_activity ( id char(32) not null, processid char(32) not null, previousid char(32), tasknodeid char(32) not null, tasknodetext varchar(64) not null, tasknodetype int2 not null, status int2 not null, createdate timestamp not null, completedate timestamp, timeoutdate timestamp, properties text, primary key(id) );

create table sf_workflow_workitem ( id char(32) not null, processid char(32) not null, activityid char(32) not null, status int2 not null, roleid char(32) not null, userid char(32) not null, usertext varchar(32) not null, deptid char(32), domainid char(32), userid2 char(32) not null, usertext2 varchar(32), deptid2 char(32), createdate timestamp not null, completedate timestamp, readmark bool not null, readdate timestamp, topmark bool not null, fallbackid char(32), retakeid char(32), retakeref char(32), ext1 varchar(64), ext2 int4 not null, primary key(id) );

create table sf_workflow_userstat ( id char(32) not null, userid char(32) not null, workitem_running int4 not null, workitem_suspended int4 not null, workitem_delegate int4 not null, workitem_complete int4 not null, workitem_abort int4 not null, workitem_retake int4 not null, workitem_unread int4 not null, workview_unread int4 not null, primary key(id) );

create table sf_workflow_variable ( id char(32) not null, variablesource int2 not null, sourceid char(32) not null, variablename varchar(32) not null, stringvalue varchar(128), clobvalue text, primary key(id), unique(variablesource, sourceid, variablename) );

create table sf_workflow_variable_log ( id char(32) not null, variableid char(32) not null, createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, stringvalue varchar(128), clobvalue text, primary key(id) );

create table sf_workflow_workview ( id char(32) not null, parentid char(32), processid char(32) not null, workitemid char(32) not null, userid char(32) not null, usertext varchar(32) not null, deptid char(32), domainid char(32), createdate timestamp not null, readmark bool not null, readdate timestamp, topmark bool not null, ext1 varchar(64), ext2 int4 not null, primary key(id), unique(processid, userid) );

create table sf_workflow_comment ( id char(32) not null, contentid char(32) not null, createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, workitemid char(32) not null, deptid char(32) not null, taskname varchar(64) not null, ccomment text not null, primary key(id) );

create table sf_workflow_comment_user ( id char(32) not null, contentid char(32) not null, createdate datetime not null, userid char(32) not null, ncomments int4 not null, primary key(id), unique(contentid, userid) );

create table sf_workflow_comment_log ( id char(32) not null, commentid char(32), createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, logtype int2 not null, ccomment text not null, primary key(id) );
